title: Banking & Financial Services Publication Company | The Asian Banker
text: Krungsri (Bank of Ayudhya PCL) has engaged Kyndryl, one of the world's largest IT infrastructure services providers, to support its transformation into a modern workplace with Microsoft 365 E3. This implementation by Kyndryl enhances the bank’s efficiency and continuity in internal processes while securely delivering a simpler and better experience for Krungsri's employees and customers. Kittipong Asawapichayon, managing director of Kyndryl Thailand, said, “As a leader in managed mobility, we are committed to helping transform every space into a modern workplace for our customers’ employees to meet the increasing demand for hybrid working. Microsoft 365 E3 can support Krungsri’s internal operations while maintaining security standards, complying with banking regulations, and fostering innovation. Kyndryl’s solution provides Krungsri with access to essential Microsoft Office applications on the Microsoft Azure cloud platform under enterprise-grade device management and security controls.” Microsoft 365 E3 enables Krungsri to adapt to new working styles more quickly and flexibly, enabling Krungsri employees to seamlessly access tools for communication, collaboration, and information sharing from anywhere, increasing the efficiency of customer service resolution while maintaining compliance with regulatory requirements and data protection standards for banks. Kyndryl also supported Krungsri in increasing its efficiency by simplifying the identity verification process with Kyndryl’s services on the Microsoft platform, which include advanced features that enable the bank to effectively monitor, validate, and help restore IT systems in the event of disasters while reducing risks and disruptions in operations and enabling employees and customers to conduct transactions more smoothly. Pochara Vanaratseath, Krungsri head of information technology group, said, “Krungsri would like to thank Kyndryl for playing a key role in enhancing internal operating efficiency by introducing modern solutions that meet our needs and reduce redundant processes. Kyndryl has helped us make it easier for employees to operate and focus on their priorities like responding to customer needs faster and more effectively. This helps us make our customers’ lives easier every day, which truly aligns with our brand promise: 'Make Life Simple' every day." Re-disseminated by The Asian Banker
